Melee Weapon Attack:
 +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

description:
Large beast, unaligned
Like their smaller kin, giant sea horses are shy, colorful fish with elongated bodies and curled tails. Aquatic elves train them as mounts.

If the sea horse moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the
target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. It the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

name: Giant Sea Horse
